channel.title: IRC Joining Guide
channel.description:
[center][size=20pt][b]The Moparisthebest and Moparscape IRC Channel[/b][/size][/center]
[center][b]IRC Servers:[/b] irc.moparisthebest.com
[b]Channels:[/b] Moparisthebest.com: #mopar Moparscape.org: #moparscape [i]*Note these are _IRC_ Servers and have nothing to do with Moparscape servers.[/i][/center]
[iurl=#cmds][b]Important commands[/b][/iurl] [iurl=#webclient][b]Getting started with the IRC Webclient[/b][/iurl] [iurl=#mIRC][b]Getting started with mIRC[/b][/iurl] [url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,237059.msg2016896.html#msg2016896][b]Getting started with xChat[/b][/url]
[anchor=cmds][b]Important commands:[/b][/anchor] Register your nickname [code]/msg nickserv register YourPassword YourEmail[/code] Identify yourself after registration and connecting all the time [code]/msg nickserv identify YourPassword[/code] Joining a channel [code]/join #channelname[/code]
[anchor=webclient][size=15pt][b]Getting started with the IRC Webclient[/b][/size][/anchor]
[size=20pt][b]1[/b][/size]. First off, go to http://www.moparisthebest.com/irc.php Your java will now start loading. Once done loading you will get some sort of popup.
[img]http://img407.imageshack.us/img407/3175/41919469ey6.png[/img]
[size=20pt][b]2[/b][/size]. Simply click [b]Cancel[/b] on this popup. You will now have the normal IRC window. In this window type [i]/server irc.moparisthebest.com[/i]
[img]http://img525.imageshack.us/img525/9528/24519161wb3.png[/img]
[size=20pt][b]3[/b][/size]. Now you connected to the IRC network. One thing left, joining the channel(s). You can do this by just using [i]/join #mopar[/i] or [i]/join #moparscape[/i]
[img]http://img120.imageshack.us/img120/1779/73410795mx0.png[/img]
[anchor=mIRC][size=15pt][b]Getting started with mIRC[/b][/size][/anchor](From mIRC.com, not specially made for Moparisthebest.com)
[size=20pt][b]1[/b][/size]. It takes only a few minutes to get started with mIRC from the moment you download and install it.
When you first start mIRC you will see the following window. This is called the [b]Connect[/b] window and allows you to connect to IRC.
Here you have to enter something for your [b]Full Name[/b] and [b]Email Address[/b]. You do not have to enter your real full name and email address.
You then have to choose your [b]Nickname[/b] and [b]Alternative nickname[/b]. These are the names by which other people will know you on IRC.
You can then click the [b]OK[/b] button and type /server irc.moparisthebest.com in the white text box.
[img]http://mirc.cachefly.net/images/installconnect.gif[/img] [i]mIRC Connect Window[/i]
[size=20pt][b]2[/b][/size]. Once you have connected to a server, your mIRC [b]Favorites[/b] folder will pop up. This window stores a list of your favorite channels and allows you to join them quickly and easily.
You can type in the name of a channel, such as #mopar for us, mIRC in the picture, or you can select a channel from the list. You can then click the [b]Join[/b] button and mIRC will join your chosen channel.
[img]http://mirc.cachefly.net/images/installfavorites.gif[/img] [i]mIRC Favorites Folder[/i]
You have now joined the IRC channel. [hr]
I don't have any tutorial on joining the IRC channels with another client. If you have one or want to make one feel free to post it, I'll add it if you want.

item.title: IRC Joining Guide
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

Sorry to bring up this ancient thread, but my concern is related to the IRC server. I use the mIRC client, but when I connected to the MITB server and attempted to join both #mopar or #moparscape I was immediately banned upon entry. Any chance this could be reversed?

Read full topic

item.title: IRC Joining Guide
item.dc:creator: @atrox atrox_
item.description:
@atrox wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:48, topic:176334”][quote author=Thug-life link=topic=237059.msg3067042#msg3067042 date=1261293149]
Can someone update the first post?

We now have 4 ircd’s:

mitb.moparisthebest.com
tlserv.moparisthebest.com
ircd1.moparisthebest.com
ircd2.moparisthebest.com

However, just use irc.moparisthebest.com and you’ll get redirected to one of them.

SSL is enabled on all of the servers on port 6697.
[/quote]

Where is ircd1 and ircd2 hosted?[/quote]
that tedjohns vps I think.

Read full topic
